É comerciante e dona do seu negócio de venda de produtos diversos.Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (cervejas, vinho, refrescos, arroz, caldos, óleo e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria e a sua diversidade.

No futuro deseja melhorar a sua casa e mobilar e tornar mais sustentável o seu negocio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é lutar contra o levado custo de vida e subida constante dos preços no mercado grossista.
texts.en:
Lucia is married and has five children, two of whom are adults. She lives with her family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else.

She has a business selling a variety of products, and she plans to use this loan to purchase merchandise (beer, wine, soft drinks, rice, broth, oil, etc.) to increase the quantity and range of her stock.

In the future she hopes to improve her house and furnish it and make her business more sustainable. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku.

Her greatest challenge is the high cost of living and the constant price increases in the wholesale market.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (beer, wine, soft drinks, rice, broth, oil, etc.).

loans.name: Assia

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos todos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É comerciante e dona do seu negocio de venda de produtos alimentares diversos.Com este empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (bolachas, massas, refrescos, sumo, arroz, caldos, óleo e outros) para aumentar a quantidade e diversificar ainda mais a sua mercadoria.

No futuro deseja expandir o seu negócio para outros cantos e tornar ainda mais sustentável, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é fazer face a concorrência no mercado e elevado custo de vida.
texts.en:
Assia is single and has three adult children. She lives in her own home with her family and is not financially responsible for anyone else.
She has a business selling various food products, and she plans to use this loan to purchase merchandise (cookies, pasta, soft drinks, juice, rice, broth, oil, etc.) to increase the quantity and range of her stock.
In the future she hopes to expand her business and make it more sustainable. She is committed to paying off this loan so she can apply for further loans from Hluvuku.
The greatest challenges she faces are fierce competition and the high cost of living.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (cookies, pasta, soft drinks, juice, rice, broth, oil, etc.).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy used clothes for resale.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona en casa de su hermana mayor, a quien ama y agradece toda su ayuda brindada, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Carlos pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Química, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones su hermana cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para engreírlo.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Carlos trabaja brindando atención al cliente en una empresa de venta de celulares, así también por las tardes trabaja en una empresa de comida rápida, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Carlos se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de inscripción, matrícula, materiales de prácticas de laboratorios y pagos para la tramitación de su título profesional; de esta manera Carlos espera obtener en poco tiempo si título profesional de Ingeniero Químico, así pues Carlos seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para logar sus sueños de ser un buen profesional y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Carlos, a 22-year-old man, lives in the city of Ica in the Parcona district in his older sister's house.  He loves her and is grateful for all her help.  He's a very pleasant, hardworking, and enthusiastic person with a great desire for self-improvement.  Thanks to his effort and the support of his family, Carlos was able to study chemical engineering.  In his free time he likes to do sports and sometimes his sister makes a delicious chicken with rice to spoil him.

With great effort and dedication, Carlos works in customer service in a mobile phone company.  Also, in the afternoon he works in a fast food restaurant.  He can work approximately 12 hours a day and he believes it's going well for him because of his dedication and the friendly way he treats people.

Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to cover the expenses of enrollment, registration, lab materials, and degree processing.  This way Carlos expects to get his professional degree in chemical engineering very soon.

He's going to continue working and making the effort to realize his dreams of being a good professional and of having his own home.

loans.use: to cover degree expenses

loans.name: Dany Daniel

texts.es:
Dany es un hombre de 21 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con su esposa, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo Dany se encontraba estudiando la carrera profesional de Gastronomía, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de generar mayores ingresos económicos, Dany tuvo que abandonar sus estudios, en sus ratos libres le gusta orar y agradecer por todas las bendiciones que Dios le ha dado, en algunas ocasiones su esposa cocina una riquísima Pachamanca para engreírlo, ya que este es su plato favorito.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Dany trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores, él se siente a gusto en su trabajo y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Dany se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos del nacimiento y compra del ajuar de su bebé, de esta manera Dany estará preparado para recibir adecuadamente a su bebé, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para que al lado de su familia pueda salir adelante.
texts.en:
Dany is a twenty-one-year-old man and lives in the city of Inca, in the district of Santiago with his wife.  He is a very kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person, and he has a great desire for self-improvement.  Thanks to his effort, Danny is studying the professional career of Gastronomy.  

Unfortunately, through lack of economic resources and through the need to generate higher economic income, Dany had to abandon his studies.  In his free time he likes to pray and give thanks for all the blessings that God has given him.  Sometimes, his wife cooks a rich Pachamanca to indulge him; this is his favorite dish.

With a lot of determination and dedication, Dany works as a field worker on an agricultural farm in his city.  Every day in the early morning hours, he begins his work.  He feels a pleasure in his job and believes that he is doing well because of his good performance and for the kind treatment that he offers to others.  

Dany finds himself very thankful for the Kiva loans.  Thanks to this offered help, he will be able to cover the expenses of the birth and furnishings/clothing for his baby.  In this way, Dany will be prepared to adequately receive his baby and he will continue working and exerting himself so that, alongside his family, he can continue moving forward.

loans.use: to cover the expenses of the birth of his baby.

loans.name: Jose Eduardo

texts.es:
Jose tiene 32 años, vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, es padre de familia y junto a su esposa tiene un hijo de 4 años de edad, Jose es un padre amoroso y un esposo amoroso y cada día se esfuerza muchos por poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.  Jose es también muy trabajador, el labora brindando servicios de segurtidad ciudadana,, el trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar con mucho esfuerzo y cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y honrado.

Jose está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá completar el dinero para poder comprar un terreno, con lo cual con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo dedicación podrá construir su vivienda, ya que actualmente vive en una casita alquilada, de esta manera el podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” tener su casa propia y darle una buena calidad de vida a su familia”.
texts.en:
José, 32, lives in the city of Guadalupe.  He's a father and with his wife has a son, age 4.  José's a loving father and husband who works hard every day to be able to give his family a better quality of life.

José's also very hardworking.  He works in security.  He works about nine hours a day and with the fruit of his labor can pay for his household expenses with great effort.  He believes it's going well for him in his job because he's very responsible and honest.

José's very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their help he'll be able to get together the money to buy a plot of land on which to build his house, with a lot of effort and especially dedication, because currently he lives in a little rental house.  This way he'll be able to improve his family's quality of life and strive to make his biggest dream come true: "To have his own house and give his family a good quality of life."

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Eudelia

texts.es:
La Sra. Edulia es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo,  es casada, y tiene 2 hijos ya mayores. Ella tiene un comedor, y gracias a las buenas comidas que hace, ya tiene una clientela  formada.
Comenta que se inicio en este rubro en una empresa muy conocida que se dedica a la misma actividad, trabajo en la misma por 10 años y luego se retiro y con el dinero que pudo ahorrar pudo abrir su negocio.
Solicita este crédito para la compra de un congelador, ya que se viene el verano y quiere poder mantener frescos sus productos. Sueña con abrir un local mas y darle mejor futuro a sus hijos
texts.en:
Sra. Eudelia is from the city of San Lorenzo. She is married and has two grown children. Eudelia has a diner. Thanks to the good food that she prepares, she has an established clientele. She says that she started in this line of work at a well-known business that sells food. Eudelia worked at this business for 10 years. After she retired, she used the money she had saved to open her own business.

Eudelia is requesting this loan so that she can buy a freezer. Summer is approaching, so she wants to keep her ingredients fresh. She dreams of opening another location and providing a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana originara del Municipio de  Masaya pero actualmente vive en Estelí, tiene 41 años de edad, casada, de oficio comerciante, madre de 4 hijos entre las edades de 10, 11, 14,18 años respectivamente. Ella cuenta que  inicio en el comercio de frutas y verduras hace 22 años cuando vivía en el Municipio de Masaya, pero como miro que no le generaba mucho ingreso, fue  que decidió viajar al municipio de Estelí  para vender sus productos de verduras ya que el comercio es mejor en esta ciudad. Actualmente cuenta con el apoyo  de sus hijos y hermano, a ella le gustaría dar a conocer sus productos en Jinotega y Ocotal en donde el comercio genera muchas ganancias y lograr un mejor nivel de vida. 
Ana solicita el préstamo  para la compra de frutas y verduras  como cebolla, tomate,  chiltoma, pepino, naranja, piña, limón y  melón etc. Este crédito le ayudara a agregar más productos a inventarios y de esta manera poder  vender mas en la época navideña, obteniendo asi mayores ganancias, ya que sus planes futuros es comprar un terreno y asi poder construir una vivienda. De esta manera seguir creciendo en su negocio, sus metas futuras es que sus hijos culminen sus estudios y tengan un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is originally from Masaya but now lives in Estelí.  She’s 41-years-old, married, a merchant and mother of four children who are 10, 11, 14 and 18 years of age respectively.  She relates that she started her fruit and vegetable business 22 years ago when she still lived in Masaya but seeing that she did not earn much income she decided to move to Estelí to sell her vegetables since commerce is better in this city.  She currently gets help from her children and her brother and she’d like to make her products known in Jinotega and Ocotal where commerce generates high profits and to attain a better standard of living.

Ana is requesting the loan to buy fruit and vegetables like onions, tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, oranges, pineapples, lemons, melon, etc.  This loan will help her add more products to her inventory and be able to sell more for the Christmas season earning higher profits that way since her future plan is to buy a lot to build a house on.  In this way to continue growing in her business; her future plan is that her children complete their education and have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Hajara

texts.en:
Hajara  lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with four children, all of whom attend school. She is not looking after any additional member of the family.

She has been selling green bananas at retail in the market for 3 years, working 6 days a week. She also sells second-hand clothes to earn additional income.

She has requested a loan of UShs 300,000 from MCDT- SACCO to enable her to stock more bananas for sale. Her challenges include seasonality of supply, and transportation. 

Her dream is to grow her business so that she is better, and to buy a delivery van to ease the transportation. She joined MCDT because she did not have enough capital for a profitable business. She rents a house with access to both electricity and piped water, and her major monthly expenses are rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more green bananas to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw materials needed in making furniture.

loans.name: Al-Athir Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Athir, which consists of two women and two men who live in Taiz, Yemen. They are requesting a loan for 80,000 YER. 

Zafran is 36 years old, married, and has one child. She works hard to provide her family with most of their needs. She owns a house and she will use her portion of the loan (20,000 YER) to buy construction supplies for her house.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies for her house.

loans.name: Maria Patricia

texts.es: La señora María tiene 37 años de edad, vive en la avenida Circunvalación Oeste de la ciudad, ella vive con sus tíos ya muchos años ella agradecida por el apoyo que le dieron en brindarle una casa,ella quiere tener una casita propia, ya que ella se vino de Potosí cuando era niña, al mismo tiempo trabaja realizando manualidades con las señoras de la zona como un trabajo grupal. María Teresa no pudo terminar su carrera de administración de empresas, porque ella no tenía a ninguna persona para poderla ayudar y ella trabajaba, también realizaba trabajos artesanales, ella cuenta ahora con un pequeño taller de manualidades ella necesita material para sus artesanias, María es madre soltera tiene una niña de cinco años con la que realiza todas sus actividades y trata de estar siempre con ella ya que solo vive con ella trata de estar el mayor tiempo posible porque quiere brindarle la atención que ella no tuvo cuando era niña por distintas circunstancias, pero María supo salir adelante. Ella necesita material para realizar sus bordados.
texts.en:
Mrs. María is thirty-seven years old and lives in the East Ring Road area. She came from Potosí when she was a child and lives together with her aunts and uncles which she has done for many years. She works as a secretary in a water systems company and at the same time she makes handicrafts together with a group of local women.

María Teresa was unable to finish her studies in business administration, because she did not have someone to support her and because she had to work. María is a single mother, with a five-year-old daughter. She tries to spend as much time as possible with her and give her all the attention that she did not have as a child, because of several reasons. However, María was able to get ahead in life.

She needs to buy material for her embroidery art.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make crafts.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: El señor Tomas tiene 34 años de edad casado con la señora Carmen hace 12 años atrás, viven en Colomi Comunidad Duraznos Pampa más de 8 años, tienen dos hijos dependientes que están estudiando en nivel primaria. Don Tomas y su esposa son una familia humilde con dedicación a la actividad agrícola tienen ingresos económicos de la venta de papa, locoto dentro del año como también la esposa hace la venta de queso elaboración propia de sus ganados 3 lecheras más 3 torillos, de esta forma ellos mantienen el estudio de sus hijos. De tal modo el señor Tomas necesita para reintegro de compra de un terreno agrícola por que en otras Entidades se les hizo muy difícil les pidieron muchos requisitos además el ahorro que tenían no les alcanzo. El vendedor del terreno le dio un plazo caso contrario perderían el terreno, ahora ellos esperan que con la ayuda de este crédito compraran el terreno y mejoraran su calidad de vida que tanto desea.
texts.en:
Tomas, 34, has been married to Carmen for 12 years.  They’ve lived in Colomi community, Duraznos Pampa for more than 8 years.  They have two dependent children who are attending elementary school.  Tomas and his wife are a humble family who work in agriculture.  They earn income selling potatoes and peppers during the year and his wife also makes cheese from milk produced by her three dairy cows; she also has three bullocks.  This is how they pay for their children’s schooling.  

Tomas needs money to pay for a piece of farmland that he was unable to get from other entities because it was very difficult; they had many requirements and besides the savings they had were insufficient.  The seller of the land gave them a time frame in which they had to pay or lose the land.  They now hope that with help from this loan they will buy the land and improve their quality of life like he so wishes.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Ileana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ileana  originaria de la comunidad  san Isidro, actualmente vive en Estelí, tiene 26 años de edad, madre de 1 hijo de 3 años. Ella cuenta que comenzó con dinero propio el cual se lo dio su compañero de vida para que estableciera su propio negocio y asi obtener un recurso extra para mantener su hogar y familia, ella es comerciante. Actualmente ella se  dedica a vender nacatamales y tortilla, de la que es propietaria  desde hace  mas de 1 año y medio.
 A ella le gustaría ampliar sus productos por todo el mercado de la ciudad, ya que  su expectativa es aumentar sus ventas y obtener mayores ganancias. Ileana solicita el financiamiento para comprar todo lo necesario para hacer sus nacatamales y tortillas como: maíz, leña, cebolla, chiltoma y papa, etc. Ya que ella estima que este préstamo le será de gran ayuda para poder  hacer crecer económicamente su negocio y asi poder  comprar las cosas al  por mayor y obtener  mejores ingresos, ya que sus planes futuros es poder poner una pulpería, y su meta  es remodelar su vivienda para vivir mejor.
texts.en:
Ileana is originally from the community of San Isidro but currently lives in Estelí.  She’s 26-years-old and the mother of a three-year-old son.  She relates that she used her own money she got from her life companion to start her own business and earn extra money for her home and family; she’s a merchant.  She sells nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales] and tortillas and has been in business more than a year and a half.

She’d like to expand her products throughout the entire city marketplace because she hopes to increase sales and earn higher profits.  Ileana is asking for the loan to buy everything needed to make her nacatamales and tortillas like corn, firewood, onions, peppers, potatoes, etc.  She figures the loan will be of great help to her to be able to grow economically and be able to buy things at wholesale and earn higher income since her future plan is to be able to open a grocery store and her goal is to remodel her house in order to live better.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, onions, peppers and potatoes.

loans.name: Grupo Alegre Group

texts.es:
El comité llamado grupo alegre se encuentra en el décimo ciclo de comité de mujeres Emprendedoras, y todas trabajan arduamente por salir adelante e ir creciendo en sus respectivas tareas.
La Sra Mirta, una de las integrantes, tiene 45 años es separada, tiene 5 hijos. Para ella sus hijos son el motivo de lucha diaria, ya que quiere darles todo a lo que ella no pudo acceder. La Sra. Mirta es empleada domestica, también es vendedora de queso en su casa. La Sra tiene varias metas una en especifica es tener ya su negocio propio.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de queso, y de esa forma poder seguir teniendo una buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes
texts.en: The committee called “Grupo Alegre” (Cheerful Group) is in its tenth cycle in the Enterprising Women Committee and all of them work hard to get ahead and to grow in their respective tasks.  Mirta is one of the members.  She’s 45-years-old, separated and has five children.  For her, her children are the reason to strive daily because she wants to give them everything she was unable to have.  Mirta is a domestic employee and also sells cheese at home.  She has several goals; one in particular is to have her own business.  She’s asking for the loan to buy cheese to have a good variety available to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy cheese to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products from Avon to resell

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Nga, 51, has three children. The oldest daughter is married, while the other two sell telephones for a living.

For the past twenty years Nga and her husband have sold metal and iron products like knifes and scissors to earn a living. She makes 3,000,000 VND a month, and her family’s total earnings are about 8,500,000 VND a month.

Nga has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. Her most recent loan was for 9,632,000 VND and she repaid it on time. She is now applying for another 9,632,000 VND loan to buy more knifes, scissors and cutting boards to sell in her store.

loans.use: to buy more knifes, scissors, cutting boards to sell in her store.

loans.name: Bayarmaa

texts.en:
Bayarmaa is 49 years old and married.  She works as a doorman in a charity school. She lives with husband in their small and old wooden house in the ger district in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia, an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads, and spotty electricity. Her old house is in very bad condition, especially the leaky roof. Due to its old age and lack of money, it has never been maintained. 

Bayarmaa decided to use cheap materials to complete her house. As she planned, they completed their house but it gets colder than others. When the weather gets colder, especially in winter; the hoarfrost forms on the surface of the walls. Bayarmaa needs to use more coal to stay warm.  They need to consume 10 tons of coal to overcome the cold winter days of the winter. Bayarmaa is requesting a loan, which she will use to thicken her walls and repair her roof

loans.use: to thicken her walls and repair her roof.

loans.name: Jhoana Carolina

texts.es:
Latacunga es la capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi, una de las provincias que forma parte de la Región Sierra del Ecuador. En los últimos años Latacunga se ha desarrollado notablemente de tal forma que es considerada una de las más importantes de la región gracias a la industria florícola, minera, metalúrgica, agroindustria, agrícola y ganadera. Además existen establecimientos de negocios que generan interesantes ingresos lo que le convierte en una ciudad comercial y con varias oportunidades para salir adelante. En esta ciudad muchas de las fiestas conservan un profundo arraigo y pureza muy cercanos a los orígenes históricos o de la tradición ancestral. En esta interesante ciudad reside Jhoana que está casada a sus cortos 21 años, terminó la secundaria, su esposo Marco de 25 años trabaja en un supermercado para sustentar a su familia, pues tienen 2 hijos de 3 años y un bebé de apenas 5 meses de nacido. Jhoana enfrentó una situación muy difícil cuando empezó a ser madre, pues su corta edad y la falta de experiencia le causaron por un momento frustración, sin embargo su espíritu emprendedor permitió que se levantara.
Hace dos años dio el paso decisivo de también aportar en su hogar para la educación y necesidades de su familia. Instaló un cibercafé con el apoyo de su esposo, aunque fue difícil al inicio por el temor de perder la inversión que estaba realizando, pero pensando en un mejor futuro para sus hijos aprendió a llevar una buena administración. Invierte desde 6 hasta 12 horas cada día, al mismo tiempo que atiende a sus pequeños hijos. El negocio tiene principalmente concurrencia de estudiantes de escuelas y colegios aledaños al barrio por lo que ella piensa que sería propicio también vender útiles escolares que le generarán mayores ingresos, para lo cual requiere un préstamo con el cual pueda adquirir estos productos. Fundación Alternativa le abrió las puertas para acceder a este crédito con agilidad y total confianza.
texts.en:
Latacunga is the capital of Cotopaxi Province, one of the provinces that is in the mountainous region of Ecuador.  In recent years, Latacunga has developed significantly and is considered to be one of the most important cities in the region thanks to industries that involve cultivating flowers, mining, metallurgy, agri-business, agriculture, and livestock breeding.  Established businesses that generate significant revenue have also converted Latacunga into a commercial city that offers various opportunities to succeed.  Many of the festivals that are conducted in this city retain their purity and are deeply rooted in the historical origins and ancestral traditions of this place.  It is in this interesting city that Jhoana makes her home.  She is 21 years old, married, and finished her high school education.  Her husband Marco, age 25, works at a supermarket in order to support their family.  They have two children, a three-year-old and a five-month-old baby.  Jhoana faced a very difficult situation when she became a mother at a young age.  Her lack of experience caused her a moment of frustration, but it was during this time that her entrepreneurial spirit emerged to the surface.  

Two years ago, she decided that she also wanted to contribute to the household by providing for the education and the necessities for her family.  She opened a cybercafé with the help of her husband.  Things were difficult at first because Jhoana was fearful of losing her investment, but she learned how to manage the business well so that she could provide a better future for her children.  She spends between six and twelve hours each day at her business while looking after her small children at the same time.  Her business is frequented mostly by elementary and high school students from the neighborhood.  She also thinks that it would be a good idea to sell school supplies to generate more income.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan so that she can acquire these products.  Fundación Alternativa has opened the doors for her to access this loan easily and with total confidence.

loans.use: to buy school supplies that she can sell in her cybercafé.

loans.name: Maria Leyla

texts.es: María Leyla de 53 anos de edad. Casada con un hijo de 26 anos de la localidad de León lugar que esta ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. María Leyla ha sido una mujer que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora, luchadora, con buenas costumbres y ha demostrado su responsabilidad de pago en los créditos anteriores. Ella tiene por actividad económica la venta ropa usada y zapatos. Ella tiene 17 anos en desempeñarse en dicha actividad. El desafío es seguir adelante con su negocio ya que tiene mucha competencia. El negocio lo inicio por tener una fuente de trabajo y tener una mejor vida económica. El financiamiento lo necesita para invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio ya que se acerca los meses con mayores ventas. Con el financiamiento comprara mercadería como blusas, camisas, faldas, short. Pantalones, ropa de niño, sandalias, zapatos deportivos,  María Leyla agradece la ayuda que los inversionista kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
María Leyla, 53, is married and has a 26-year-old child.  She lives in the town of León, in the western part of the country.  María Leyla has been a very hardworking woman, a fighter with good habits who has shown the responsibility of paying back her previous loans.

Her job is selling used clothing and shoes.  She has been in this work for 17 years.  The challenge is getting ahead with her business, because there's a lot of competition.  She started the business to have a source of work and a better economic life.

She needs the loan to invest in working capital and to stock her business because the biggest sales months are approaching.  With the loan she'll buy merchandise such as blouses, shirts, skirts, shorts, pants, children's clothing, sandals, and sport shoes.

María Leyla is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders give to low-income people and poor countries like Nicaragua so they have a means for a decent job.

loans.use: to stock her business with used clothing

loans.name: Las Orquideas Group

texts.es:
El comité “LAS ORQUIDEAS” se encuentra en el noveno ciclo del programa de Mujeres Emprendedoras y están saliendo adelante gracias al esfuerzo que cada una pone. Una de estas mujeres es Angelica.
Angelica es la presidenta de este grupo, y comenta que siempre trata de motivar a sus amigas a seguir trabajando y cada día ir creciendo. Ella tiene una mercería donde vende todo tipo de productos, y es gracias a este negocio que ayuda a su familia.
Su meta es seguir creciendo, y en miras a seguir haciéndolo es que solicita este crédito, ya que quiere comprar prendas, calzados,  y demás. para poder tener bien surtido su negocio.
texts.en: The “Las Orquídeas” (Orchids) committee is in the 9th cycle in the Enterprising Women program and are getting ahead thanks to the effort each one makes.  One of these women is Angélica.  She’s group president and comments that she always tries to motivate her girlfriends to continue working and growing every day.  She has a general store where she sells all types of products and thanks to this business is able to help her family.  Her goal is to continue growing and aiming at continue doing so is requesting this loan she wants to use to buy clothes, shoes and others to have a well-stocked store.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya and runs a wholesale shop, which has been in operation for ten years. He is a married father of four children. He started the business from the capital he received while selling paper bags from a nearby factory. Despite the effect of price fluctuations, Benard aspires to own another wholesale shop in town. He learned of Milango from his friends, and joined this year. He is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenyan shillings to increase the stock of soap, cooking fat, etc. in his shop. Benard believes the additional income from this loan will help him plan for the purchase of a car to transport his products.

loans.use: to increase the stock of soap, cooking fat, etc. in his shop

loans.name: Majan

texts.en:
Majan is thirty nine years old and married. He lives in a minority community, and is the father of two children, ages two and four. 

For quite some time, he has been working in an agricultural business. He grows wheat and corn on his land, and then sells the products in his area in order to earn a living. He started at the beginning with only a small tractor, and now he has upgraded to a new tractor. 

Majan is asking for a loan to pay the bills for his new tractor. This loan will help him to expand his work and to earn more income. He is hoping in the future to secure a life and provide a better education for his children.

Majan is very grateful to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To pay the bills for his new tractor.

loans.name: Shemsi

texts.en:
Shemsi, 29, is single and works in construction. He lives with his entire family, including his father who works as a guard. Recently his father and he started to build a new house with the money that they had saved, but they still need money to finish the roof.

Shemsi is applying for a loan of 1,500 EUR to buy materials to complete the home’s roof. With winter coming on, he would like to do so to keep everyone in the family warm, safe and healthy.

Shemsi wants to get married in the future and have his own family. He is very thankful for all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to buy materials to complete his home’s roof.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages to resell.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Carmen tiene 43 años de edad, casada, tiene 5 hijos cuatro de ellos están estudiando y una tiene 6 meses de edad,  y viven en un barrio que pertenece al municipio de Colinas, Santa Bárbara. Se casó hace 16 años y su esposo trabaja en una empresa privada quien le apoya en el hogar.  
Doña Carmen se dedica a la costura. Especialista en la elaboración de cortinas, ropa de cama, y otras prendas de vestir. Empezó su negocio hace 16 años elaborando ropa para niños y luego con cortinas. Le dedica todo el día cuando tiene muchos pedidos.
Ella ha solicitado siete préstamos con el actual, que  es por 7,000 Lempiras, con los anteriores compro una maquina mas para su taller sustituyendo una manual. Este nuevo préstamo lo utilizara para comprar materia prima como ser: telas, hilos, agujas, adornos, encajes, botones, zíperes y otros que necesite para la elaboración de cortinas, sabanas y prendas de vestir. Con el objetivo de tener material para hacer los pedidos pendientes y porque se acerca la temporada de mayor demanda de sus servicios. Su meta es seguir creciendo con el negocio y poder seguir ayudando a sus hijos con la educación.Agradece a ODEF y a KIva por este nuevo préstamo que le han ayudado mucho con su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Carmen is 43 years old, married, and has five children. Four of them are studying and the youngest is six months old. Carmen and her family live in a neighborhood in the town of Colinas, Santa Bárbara. She has been married for 16 years and her husband works at a private company in order to support their household.

Doña Carmen is a seamstress who specializes in making curtains, bed sheets, and articles of clothing. She established her business 16 years ago by making children’s clothing, but later she started making curtains. Carmen spends her entire day working whenever she has many orders.

She has received seven loans to date, with this one amounting to 7,000 HNL. With her previous loans, she was able to buy a sewing machine for her workshop in place of an existing manual machine. This new loan will be used to buy raw materials such as fabrics, thread, needles, accessories, lace, buttons, zippers, and other supplies that she needs for making curtains, bed sheets, and clothing. Her goal is to have the materials required to complete her outstanding orders. The upcoming season is the time when there is greater demand for her services.

Carmen’s goal is to keep her business growing so that she can continue helping her children with their education. She is grateful to ODEF and Kiva for this new loan, which will be a great help for her business.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, needles, accessories, lace, buttons, zippers, and other supplies.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Emprendedoras es un Excelente grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá, gracias a que la actual presidenta, la Sra. Epifania, quien se dedica a la venta de verduras. El grupo ya está en su quinto ciclo y desean poder seguir creciendo.
Epifania se define a si misma como una persona muy trabajadora, que se esfuerza al máximo por salir adelante y dar a su familia y a los suyos todo lo que necesitan, para no tener que pasar por necesidades.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de verduras, como ser cebollas, tomates, locotes y demás. Todas ellas desean seguir trabajando y creciendo dentro del programa.
texts.en: “Mujeres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Women) is an excellent group of women from the city of Itá thanks to the current president Epifania who sells vegetables.  The group is in its 5th cycle and they’d like to be able to continue growing.  Epifania defines herself as a very hardworking person who strives to the maximum to get ahead with her family and to give her loved ones everything they need so that they won’t go through any privations.  She’s asking for this loan to buy vegetables like onions, tomatoes, peppers and others.  All of them want to continue working and growing within the program.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Thanh was born in 1981. She has two children. Her oldest child is in 1st grade; her youngest is 2. Her husband is a computer repairer, and his income is about 3,000,000 VND. 

Thanh sells computers and stationery/document machines to earn a living. Her salary is about 2,500,000 VND. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,500,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy computers to sell in her store. She wants to use the proceeds to raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy computers to sell in her store.

loans.name: Byamba

texts.en:
Byamba is a 55-year-old widow who has two daughters. She lives with them in the outer ger district, which lacks the basic infrastructure of Ulaanbaatar City. She supports her family by selling clothes at the second-largest outdoor market in the city.

Byamba is a repeat and trusted client of Transcapital Co. Ltd. She is applying for a 2,000,000 MNT loan to buy warm clothes to sell in this coming winter season.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes to sell.

loans.name: Tsermaa

texts.en:
Tsermaa is a 56-year-old woman who lives with her daughter and her infirm spouse in a small apartment. Her daughter is a high school pupil, and her husband became infirm a few years ago. 

Aside from looking after her spouse, she supports her family by operating a pharmacy business downstairs from her apartment. She is a very hard-working and strong woman who vows to live her life only for her family. 

“I have a few years' experience in the pharmacy business, and I really appreciate that my business has expanded since I started it. If I buy a cash register, I can save all incoming funds there, not in my wallet. It's more comfortable for me and safer for my micro business,” she said happily.  

Tsermaa is requesting a 2,800,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) to purchase more medicine to sell and increase working capital.

loans.use: to increase her working capital and increase medicine variety.

loans.name: Enkhtur

texts.en:
Enkhtur is a 29-year-old married father of two. He lives with his family in the outer ger district, which lacks the basic infrastructure of the city (Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia). He started his cell phone repair business in 2009. 

Besides cell phone repair, he sells cell phone cases and other accessories. He is requesting a 2,000,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) loan to purchase tools and other cell phone repair tools to sell and to enlarge his current rental stall.

loans.use: to purchase cell phone repair tools and expand his current rental stall.

loans.name: Flora Virginia

texts.es:
La socia  Es la señora Flora Virginia, ella pertenece al banco “LUZ DEL SUR” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. La socia  es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella continua dedicándose a la docencia universitaria, la socia en esta oportunidad está solicitando el préstamo para comprar material didáctico como material digital, resúmenes y separatas,  para sus clases.
Flora Virginia trabaja mucho y se sacrifica para darle a su último hijo una mejor vida, y lo que es más importante, brindarle y pagarle una mejor educación universitaria.
La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y  una mejor educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
The associate is Sra. Flora Virginia, who is part of the bank “Luz Del Sur” (Light of the South) of the city of Cusco Peru. The associate is a hard working woman. She continues devoting herself to teaching at the university.

The associate in this opportunity is requesting a loan to purchase teaching tools such as digital materials, summaries, and print outs for her classes. 

Flora Virginia works hard and sacrifices to give her youngest son a better life. It is most important to provide and pay for a better university education. The associate is very grateful with Kiva for letting her give a better life to her family and a better education to her son.

loans.use: to purchase educational materials

loans.name: Yaneht

texts.es:
Yaneht continúa en el banco comunal “Imasumac II” y en el negocio de venta de artesanía. Ella hace trabajos de artesanía como aretes y collares, además trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m. hasta las 5:00 p.m. Por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos y su sueño es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de artesanía. 

Solicitó el último crédito para comprar materiales como: alambres, pegamentos y piedras de colores. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yaneht continues as a member of the Imasumac II community bank and with her handicraft business.  She works making handicrafts such as earrings and necklaces.  She works from 9:00am until 5:00pm.  This business helps her improve the lives of her children.  Her dream is to expand and improve her business.

She is requesting this loan to purchase materials such as wire, glue, and colored stones.  She is happy with the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase wire, glue, and colored stones.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: Gregoria continúa en el negocio de elaboración y venta de chicha de jora. Ella tiene una pequeña picantería donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m. hasta las 5:00 p.m.  Por medio de este negocio saca adelante a su familia. Su sueño es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de picantería (Estableciendo donde se expende chicha de jora). Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos para preparar chicha de jora y frutillada como: maíz, azúcar y levadura. Está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Gregoria continues to run her business making and selling “chicha de jora” (a traditional fermented beverage made of corn).  She has a small eatery where she works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m.  Thanks to this business, she is able to support her family.  Her dream is to improve her eatery (Establishing an area where the chicha de jora is dispensed.)  She is asking for this loan to buy ingredients for the preparation of chicha de jora and frutillada (a variation on chicha that uses fresh strawberries for flavoring), such as corn, sugar, and yeast.  She is happy for the loan and promises that she will make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn, sugar, and yeast.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: La socia continúa con uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociación Arariwa y con el negocio de venta de ropa como pantalones, casacas, blusas y chompas. Su jornada laboral empieza desde las 8:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m. Por medio de este negocio saca adelante a su familia. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como blusas, polos, chompas y pantalones.
texts.en: The member continues to be a member of one of the communal banks of Arariwa Association and to operate her business of selling clothing such as pants, jackets, blouses, and sweaters. Her daily work begins at 8:00 a.m. and goes to 6:00 p.m. With this business she is raising her family. She has now had this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for her. At this time she needs the loan to buy merchandise such as blouses, polo shirts, sweaters, and pants.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as blouses, polo shirts, sweaters, and pants to sell

loans.name: Señor De Coyllorytty De Collana Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE COYLLORYTTY DE COLLANA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Soledad ella es conviviente y tiene 35 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza de animales como gallinas y cuyes, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en el mercado o en las diferentes ferias, la socia ya tiene 2 años en este negocio anteriormente la socia se dedicaba al negocio de venta de ropa pero no le fue muy bien y decidió de cambiarse de negocio, la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes y gallinas y también para comprar alimentos para los animales.
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de restaurant, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are the members of the village bank "Senor de Coyllorytty de Collana", located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Soledad, 35, is married and has three children. She raises animals like guinea pigs and hens, fattening them up and later selling them in the market or other fairs. She has been doing this for two years; before that she sold clothing but it wasn't going very well so she decided to change. Through this business she gets her kids ahead. Her dream is to have a store to sell her animals. 

She asks for a loan to buy guinea pigs and hens and also food for the animals. She thanks those who become part of her dream through this loan and promises to make her payments in the established time frame.

The other members of the group are vegetable sellers, restauranteurs, grocery store owners and animal vendors.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and hens and food for them.

loans.name: Tesa Peara Group

texts.es:
El comité Tesa Peara es de la ciudad de San Pedro, tiene 10 integrantes, todas muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, que trabajan arduamente por sus familias y por el bien de sus hijos.
Cristina, una de las miembros se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos, ya que tiene una mercería bien surtida. Comenta que empezó con un negocio pequeño, pero que de a poco y gracias a su trabajo ha ido creciendo.
Cristina solicita de este crédito para la compra de calzados, prendas, artículos de bazar y demás productos, y de esa forma poder seguir dando una buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: The “Tesa Peara” committee is from the city of San Pedro and has 10 members; all are very hardworking and enterprising and work hard for their families and for their children’s wellbeing.  Cristina is one of the members and she sells all types of products since she has a well-stocked general store.  She comments that she started out with a small store but gradually thanks to her work it’s been growing.  She’s asking for this loan to buy shoes, clothes, kitchen items and other products to continue offering a wide variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothes, kitchen items and other products.

loans.name: Nuestra Señora De La Asuncion Group

texts.es:
El comité Nuestra Señora de la Asunción surge de la unión de 13 mujeres de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, ellas son jefas de familias, que quieren ayudar a sus familias por medio de su trabajo y de su esfuerzo.
La Sra. Miguela, presidenta del grupo tiene 40 años, es una mujer muy emprendedora y capaz de liderar un grupo numeroso como lo es este, durante todos estos ciclos ha demostrado ganas de superación y deseos de seguir creciendo. Se  dedica a las ventas varias y solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, fideos, carne, leche, panificados, arroz, etc.
El grupo esta contento por formar parte del programa y todas ellas desean seguir trabajando juntas y creciendo.
texts.en: The “Nuestra Señora de la Asunción” (Our Lady of the Assumption) committee arose when 13 women from the city of San Lorenzo joined together.  They are heads of household who want to help their families by means of their work and effort.  Miguela, 40, is group president.  She’s an enterprising woman who is capable of leading a large group like this one.  Throughout the cycles she’s shown a strong drive for self-improvement and desire to continue growing.  She sells various things and is asking for this loan to buy sugar, noodles, meat, milk, baked goods, rice, etc.  The group is happy to be part of the program and they all want to continue working and growing together.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, meat, milk, baked goods, rice, etc.

loans.name: Espiritu Santo Group

texts.es:
Daisy es parte del grupo Espiritu Santo, ella se dedica a la peluquería, ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y que suela con ir agrandando su negocio para poder así también ayudar a otras personas.
El grupo Espiritu Santo tiene 12 mujeres, donde todas ellas son jefas de familia, que desean luchar por los suyos y dar a sus hijos todo lo que pueden para una buena educación.
La Sra. Daisy solicita este crédito para la compra de spray, gel, tijeras, y otros insumos que ella va a usar para seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Daisy is part of the communal bank "Espiritu Santo," and she has a beauty salon business.  She is a very enterprising woman who is working to expand her business so that she can also help other people.

The "Espiritu Santo" communal bank is made up of 12 women, all of whom are head of households who strive to give their children everything they can so that they can get a good education.

Daisy is requesting a loan to buy hair spray, gel, scissors and other supplies that she will use to continue to provide good service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy hair spray, gel, scissors and other supplies for her salon

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is a resident of Kongowea, Kenya. He is single and owns a barber shop which has been in operation for five years; he began the business from the savings he had built up over a long period of time. Benard is applying for a loan of 41,900 Kenyan shillings to purchase shavers and other equipment. He was introduced to Milango by his friends. Although the high cost of purchasing this equipment is a challenge for his business, Benard believes that the addition of these new machines will help improve his sales. His ambition is to open a cereal shop in the future to increase his sources of income.

loans.use: To purchase shavers and other business equipment.

loans.name: Livanisa

texts.en:
Livanisa is a 45-year-old divorced woman with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. After the breakup with her husband, she had to assume total responsibility for her children, and her desire is to see them graduate with degrees.

For three years Livanisa has been selling clothes, using her income to pay her children's school fees and buy land for farming. Price fluctuations and inadequate capital to meet the varied tastes and preferences of her customers are her major challenges. Now requesting this loan facility to buy clothes ahead of the Christmas season, Livanisa's business dream is to establish a modern boutique in town.

loans.use: to buy clothes ahead of the Christmas season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more ingredients to make her dishes.

loans.name: Real Atahuallpa Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Real de Atahuallpa” en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del Departamento del Cusco. Ya son varios años que funciona el banco comunal y está bien organizado. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de habas, venta bebidas calientes, venta de cosméticos y venta de comida otros socios se dedican a la brindar servicio de cocina, mantenimiento de carros, albañil, cocinero, trasportista. 

(La señora Delia esta levantando la mano en la fotografia). 
Delia nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella se dedica a vender desayunos y hacer llamadas en los alrededores de uno de los mercados más populares de la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Su esposo de Delia se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte urbano en la ciudad del Cusco en su propio carro asi de esta manera ayuda en la canasta familiar. En esta oportunidad Delia requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro o sea va comprar llantas. 

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (La socias que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía llegaron tarde a la reunión).
texts.en:
“Real de Atahuallpa” is a Communal Bank who has been created by a group of friends and neighbors living in Puno, a department of the district and province of Cusco. This Communal Bank has been working for a few years now, and it is well organized. This Communal Bank is composed of people who constantly look for occasions to progress in life, and who grant a better future to their children thanks to their daily efforts. Some of the members engage in selling broad beans, hot drinks, cosmetics and food, while others engage in providing cooking services, in repairing vehicles, and in offering their services as masons, cooks and truck drivers.

Delia is the lady in the picture with her hand raised.

Delia was born in Cusco, and she lives in the same town where she was born. She engages in selling breakfasts and in providing calling services in the outskirts of one of the most popular markets in Cusco. She has been engaging in this activity for a few years already, and things are going very well. Delia’s husband provides public transportation services in the town of Cusco with his own vehicle, thus helping with the household expenses. In this occasion, Delia is requesting a loan to provide maintenance to the vehicle by buying tires.

The members are grateful for the chance they have been given and they commit to complying with the repayment of their different dues according to schedule. The members appearing at the bottom of the picture have arrived late at the meeting.

loans.use: To buy tires for her vehicle.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca De Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE CUSCO”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Andrea  ella es casada  y tiene 56 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que más le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de confección de ropa, venta de comida, restaurante, carpinteria, artesania, venta de muebles, crianza de animales menores, venta de ropa.

Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta son socios que pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members are part of the Communal Bank “Senor de Huanca de Cusco", which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

One of the members is Sra. Andrea.  She is 56 years old, married, and has five children.  Andrea divides her time between her daily activities and managing her business of buying and selling small animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens.  She has been in this business for years and has done very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work each day.  Andrea raises the animals from the time they are young until they are ready to be sold to her customers who request them.  She is a responsible and industrious person who works in order to help her family move forward.  Andrea is requesting a loan in order to buy guinea pigs for her business.

The other group members have businesses that involve making clothes, selling food, managing a restaurant, carpentry work, handicrafts, selling furniture, raising small animals, and selling clothes.  The smaller attached photo shows two members who requested permission to arrive late to the group meeting for work reasons.  

Andrea is grateful to everyone who helped to fulfill her dream in this manner.  She promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Santa Librada 2 Group

texts.es:
15 son las mujeres de la ciudad de Encarnación que se unieron para poder trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo salir adelante. Están en su segundo ciclo y desean seguir creciendo.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Lourdes, ella tiene su despensa en su casa, y su negocio está creciendo día a día por medio del trabajo y sacrificio que hace. Su meta es poder tener el día de mañana un gran autoservice para poder seguir abasteciendo a su clientela.
Solicita del crédito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, enlatados, verduras y demás, y así seguir con su negocio bien surtido.
texts.en:
These 15 women from the city of Encarnación joined together so that they could work as a group and help one another get ahead. They are in their second loan cycle and want to keep growing.

One of the members is Sra. Lourdes, who operates a food pantry in her home. Her business is growing each day because of the work and sacrifice that she has invested. Lourdes’ goal for the future is to have a successful self-service shop that continues to provide products for her customers.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy beverages, food products, canned goods, vegetables, and other items so that she can keep her business well-stocked.

loans.use: to buy beverages, food products, canned goods, vegetables, and other items.

loans.name: Mahoudjro 2 Group

texts.fr: MAHOUDJRO 2 est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres sont des amies appartenant à un même groupe de tontine. La représentante du groupe, Mireille (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 31 ans et est mariée à un certain Lucien. Mireille est mère de quatre enfants dont certains scolarisés et tous à la charge du couple. Mireille vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Il y a près de dix ans que Mireille vend divers articles et des condiments près d’une place publique du Bénin. Mireille mène cette activité afin de pouvoir aux besoins du ménage. Mireille s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Mireille sollicite un premier crédit avec les autres membres du groupe MAHOUDJRO 2. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en:
Mahoudjro 2 is a group of three people, who are all friends and belong to the same savings group. The group’s representative is Mireille (pictured with her hand raised in the photo). She is 31 years of age, and is married to Lucien. Mireille has four children, some of whom are at school and all under the care of the couple. Mireille lives with her children and her husband, and together the couple makes sure that the various household expenses are covered.

Mireille has worked for almost 10 years selling miscellaneous articles and seasoning close to a public square in Benin. She has this business so that she can contribute to paying the household expenses, and gets her supplies in a market in Benin. In order to ensure customer satisfaction, she has asked for her first loan, along with the other members of the Mahoudjro 2 group. This loan will allow them to better meet their customers’ requests, as well as to generate more profits.

loans.use: To buy various articles and seasoning.

loans.name: Santos Faustino

texts.es:
El señor Santos Faustino está casado, tiene 24 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la tejeduría inicio este negocio con sus padres cuando era pequeño, y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes clases y colores, y también  la compra de diamante de seda que es un adorno que agrega en sus tejidos. Espera en el futuro tener varios empleados y un negocio rentable.
texts.en:
Santos Faustino is married. He is 24 years old and didn't have a chance to go to school. He works in weaving and started this business with his parents when he was younger. He has five years of experience so far and his wife, who works the same trade, helps him. 

He is requesting a loan, which he will use to purchase different types of threads in different colors and also to buy "silk diamonds" which he uses to embellish the fabrics he weaves. He hopes to have several employees and a profitable business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase weaving materials.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angélica, de 48 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y deseosa de progresar, está casada con Miguel. Juntos habitan a lado de sus tres hijos y sus dos nietos a los que quiere mucho, esta contenta de poder tenerlos cerca, su inmuebles esta hecho de material noble. La actividad que realiza Angélica es la venta de comidas tales como menús, y para desarrollar su trabajo ha establecido con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación un modesto restaurante en su casa. Realiza este negocio por más 7 años y trabaja con la ayuda de otra persona quien le apoya en la atención a los clientes que ha logrado consolidar gracias a la buena sazón que pone en cada uno de los platillos que ofrece. Complementa cada platillo con la venta de gaseosas y otras bebidas heladas. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le brinda buenos ingresos económicos y eso le ayuda a solventar los gastos básicos de su hogar, además se siente muy contenta generando su propia fuente de trabajo. Por fortuna su negocio ha tenido buena acogida por los clientes y es por eso que desea brindarles una mayor comodidad y mantener la calidad y el buen sabor de los potajes que ofrece. Este es el préstamo número 12 con MFP, está muy agradecida por la oportunidad crediticia que le brindan y por el respaldo financiero que necesita para seguir adelante. Se compromete a pagar sus cuotas mensuales de manera puntual y continuar trabajando con mucha responsabilidad junto a los miembros de su banco comunal. 
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, comprará algunos artículos de cocina que desea renovar como ollas, cucharones, platos, tazas, vasos y sartenes.
texts.en:
Angélica, 48, is a hardworking woman who wants to make progress.  She’s married to Miguel and they live with their three children and two grandchildren she loves very much.  She’s happy to be able to have them nearby.  Her house is made of substantial materials.  

Angélica’s activity is cooking food like complete meals and to do so has established with much effort and dedication a modest restaurant at home.  She’s been in business for more than 7 years and works with help of another person who helps her with customer service.  She’s acquired a good clientele thanks to the tasty way she prepares the dishes she offers.  She complements each dish with the sale of soft-drinks or other cold beverages.  

What she likes about her activity is that it produces good income which helps her cover basic household expenses.  She also feels very happy generating her own source of employment.  Fortunately, her business has been well-received by her customers and this is why she’d like to offer them improved comfort and to maintain the good quality and flavor of the dishes she prepares.  

This will be her 12th MFP loan and she’s very grateful for the credit opportunity she’s being offered and for the financial backup she needs to continue forward.  She commits to make her monthly installment payments punctually and to continue working very responsibly with her fellow communal bank members.  She will use the 1,500 new soles to buy some kitchen utensils she needs to replace like pots, ladles, dishes, cups, glasses and pans.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils like pots, ladles, dishes, cups, glasses and pans.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma, de 54 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, alegre y muy amable, le gusta los retos. Convive con  Manuel, y fruto de esa unión tienen 2 hijos. Actualmente habitan en su propia casa en compañía de su hija Farol de 22 años de edad. Ella lucha día a día para darles lo mejor.
El negocio que tiene Irma es la venta de comidas, actividad que realiza cada fin de semana, siendo su centro de trabajo en un pequeño espacio que acondiciono en la vereda de su casa, ofreciendo platos regionales como juanes, pollos fritos, asados y otros. Atiende siempre de manera amable y cordial a su distinguida clientela. Su actividad empieza desde muy temprana para ir a comprar los ingredientes, que le serviran en la preparación de estos platillos. Ya  lleva más de 16  años en éste negocio y cuenta con el apoyo de su hija para atender al público. Considera que su trabajo es bastante rentable, por la clientela constante que ha mantenido gracias a la buena sazón de sus comidas. Le gusta su negocio pues le ha traído muchas satisfacciones personales y económicas, asegura que es una actividad que no requiere de mucho esfuerzo físico más de lo debido y eso le permite seguir adelante, desea que su trabajo permanezca estable para que continúe trabajando. Este es el préstamo número 4 con MFP, está muy agradecida por la oportunidad crediticia que le brindan y por el respaldo financiero que necesita para seguir adelante. Se compromete a pagar sus cuotas mensuales de manera puntual y continuar trabajando con mucha responsabilidad junto a los miembros de su banco comunal. Con el monto solicitado de 1,500 nuevos soles comprará víveres e ingredientes para la preparación de una mayor variedad de platillos, también comprará gaseosas.
texts.en:
Irma, 54, is an enterprising woman who is cheerful and very friendly.  She lives with Manuel, and together they have 2 children.  They currently live in their own home with their daughter, Farol, who is 22 years old.  She struggles each day to give her family the best. 

Irma has a business selling food, an activity that she carries out every weekend.  She works in a small space that she set up on the sidewalk in front of her house, where she offers regional dishes such as "juanes" (a dish made from chicken and rice), fried chicken, grilled meat and other specialties.  She provides friendly service to her honored customers.  

Irma starts this work very early in the morning when she goes to buy the ingredients that she will use to prepare the dishes.  She has had this business now for over 16 years, and her daughter helps her tend to the public.  She considers this work to be quite profitable, because of the regular customers that she has maintained thanks to the good taste of her cooking.  She enjoys her business, as it has brought her both personal and financial satisfaction.  She says that this is an activity that doesn't require an excessive amount of physical exertion, and this allows her to continue forward with it.  She wants her business to remain stable so that she can keep on working.  

This is Irma's 4th loan with MFP, and she is very grateful for the loan opportunity that they are providing her, giving her the financial support that she needs to continue forward.  Irma promises to make her monthly payments on time, and to continue to work responsibly with the other members of her communal bank.  With the sum of 1,500 Peruvian soles that she requests, she will buy groceries and ingredients to prepare a larger variety of dishes.  She will also buy soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy groceries and soft drinks for her food business

loans.name: Yasmeen

texts.en:
Yasmeen is 46 years old and married. She has one beautiful child, and Yasmeen’s world revolves around that child. Her husband is a painter whose income is not sufficient to meet the needs of his family members.

Realizing this shortage of income, Yasmeen quickly adopted sewing as a second source of income for her household. She is now experienced enough to create all sorts of designs and so fulfill the demands and requirements of her customers.

Due to the changing season Yasmeen is getting more orders, so she needs to buy more spools of thread and packs of lace and buttons to complete her orders on time. She now is applying for a 15,000 PKR loan from Kashf to help in this respect.

Yasmeen will surely set aside money from her profits to better her family’s life.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread and packs of lace and buttons.

loans.name: Farhodjon

texts.en:
Farhodjon, a 22-year-old married man, has always wanted to provide a good quality of life for his family. It is for this reason that he began his own taxi business five years ago. Thanks to his good service, Farhodjon has managed to gain many customers, and his family’s quality of life has been improving; their financial challenges are being solved little by little.

Farhodjon is requesting a loan to repair his car, which will enable him to provide better service and increase his income. This, in turn, will allow him to offer his family a better quality of life and greater opportunity to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to repair his car.

loans.name: San Juan Group

texts.es:
Isabel de las Nieves es la presidenta del grupo San Juan, el cual está en su primer ciclo. Ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas y quieren poder llegar al máximo nivel del programa de mujeres emprendedoras.
Isabel se dedica a la venta de ropas, y por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia, ya que gracias a su trabajo tiene los ingresos para poder ayudarlos.  Es una persona con ganas de salir adelante y ser mejor en la vida.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas de variadas clases, en especial de verano, para poder seguir vendiendo sus productos.
texts.en:
Isabel de las Nieves is the president of the communal bank "San Juan," which is in its first loan cycle.  This group is learning to work together, and they want to get to the highest level of the Enterprising Women program.

Isabel has a business selling clothing, and through this business she helps her family.  Thanks to her work, she has the income to help them.  She is a person who has a strong desire to better herself and get ahead in life.

Isabel is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of various kinds of garments, especially summer clothing, so that she can continue to sell products.

loans.use: to buy garments to sell

loans.name: 3.14.196.thiệu Khánh Group

texts.en:
Thanh is 41 years old, married, and has 2 children. She has a manufacturing business making iron furniture. She supports 2 dependents with her business, which is located in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is a lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make iron and aluminum goods for sale. 

In 2011, Thanh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business, and has successfully repaid 2 loans from them. She is the group leader of the 3.14.196.Thiệu Khánh  solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. With her profits from this loan, Thanh hopes to improve her business, buy more supplies and equipment for it, and remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make iron and aluminum goods for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock for her shop.

loans.name: Fateh

texts.en: Fateh is a 23-year-old man who is single and lives in Taiz, Yemen. He is a person who is very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic and has a great desire to succeed. By his own initiative, and with much effort and enthusiasm, his has an educational background and a diploma. He owns a house and intends to buy furniture but he doesn't have sufficient money so he applied for a youth loan of 100,000 YER to buy furniture for his house.

loans.use: to buy furniture for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more products from Avon to sell.

loans.name: Tuong

texts.en:
Tuong was born in 1975. She has two children. Her daughter is a student. Her son is a pupil in the 8th grade. Her husband is a carpenter. Tuong sells feed to earn a living. She earns 5,000,000 dong (VND) a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 dong (VND) per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 dong (VND) and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 dong (VND) to buy feed, fertilizer, seeds, and pesticides to sell in her store. She wants to use the benefits from this loan to raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy feed, fertilizer, seeds and pesticides to sell in her store.

loans.name: Rita Isabel Paola

texts.es:
Isabel es una joven de 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, vive al lado de sus padres a quienes quiere mucho, Isabel es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante,  por ello día a día Isabel trabaja en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, con el cual puede ayudarse con los pagos de sus estudios superiores ya que actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Administración de empresas, Isabel trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al dia ya que por las noches va a su centro de estudios; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es my responsable y sobre todo su carisma y sus ganas de hacer las cosas bien.

Isabel está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá pagar los gastos de su mensualidad, con lo cual podra aistir sin problemas a sus clases y poder seguir estudiando, asi ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño: “Ser una gran gran profesional y tener un restaurante”.
texts.en:
Isabel is a young woman who is 19 years of age. She lives in the city of Ica with her parents who she loves dearly.

Isabel is a young woman who has the drive to succeed, so she works each day at a farming estate in the city in order to pay for her higher education. She is currently studying for a degree in Business Administration. Isabel works approximately eight hours a day and then attends classes at night. She believes she is doing well in her work because she is responsible, charismatic, and gives her best in everything she does.

Isabel is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, she will be able to pay her monthly tuition installment so that she can attend her classes without problems and continue her studies. Isabel continues to strive toward fulfilling her greatest dream of becoming a successful professional and owning a restaurant.

loans.use: to pay her monthly tuition installment.

loans.name: Odgerel

texts.en: Odgerel, 45, is the mother of two children, and lives with her family in a ger (the traditional Mongolian nomadic tent). Her daughters, aged 18 and 17, are university students. She and her husband sell Japanese car parts at a local market. Her husband is an invalid but he is always helping his wife with the business. Odgerel started her business in 2005 with a working capital of 1,000,000 MNT and she has managed to increase it since then. They purchase their products once or twice a month. Since she started this business, Odgerel has been providing money for her family’s expenses and paying her children’s education fees. She is an open person who has very good communication skills. She says, “The most important thing to me is to provide a good education for my children." She is requesting a 3,800,000 MNT loan to purchase more spare parts for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more spare parts for her business

loans.name: Eliso

texts.en:
Eliso is 47 years old. She lives with her husband, son, daughter-in-law and an infant grandchild in a small village in the Senaki district. Her son works as a soldier and gets a monthly salary. The family’s main income comes from agricultural activities. Eliso has a milk cow and 2 calves. She milks the cow and produces cheese, which is sold locally in an open market at a good price. She also has a pig and sells piglets. In addition to this, she owns a hectare of land, where she sows maize. 

Eliso is a very hard working woman and does her best to ensure good harvests. She has requested a loan to purchase an additional milk cow. This will enable her to increase her cheese production. It will significantly increase the income of the family and thus they will improve their living conditions. Eliso awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Lawrence

texts.en: Lawrence is a 34-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling cassava flour for four years and works twelve hours a day. His business is located on a busy street, thus attracting many customers. He also earns extra income from his salary as a driver. His personal goal is to educate his children, build a house and buy land for farming while his business goal is to own a food store despite the challenges of stiff competition and lack of enough capital to meet the demands. Lawrence is requesting a loan to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour to sell.
